features: Stay fresh all day long with the rich and relaxing aroma of Refreshing Lavender Secret Fresh Clear Gel Antiperspirant and Deodorant for Women
Ditch the white marks on your clothes with clear gel that goes on clear and dries fast
Sweat and odor are no match for its 48 hours of odor control and wetness protection
This unique formula helps stop odor before it starts
Stay dry, odor-free, and unstoppably fresh with Secret Fresh Clear Gel Antiperspirant/Deodorant, Refreshing Lavender scent
body.description: Designed with scents that last, the Secret Fresh Collection has scents you love. Secret Antipirspirant and Deodorant for Women Fresh Clear Gel immediately fights odor and provides 48-hour sweat and odor protection, helping you stay fresh and confident day in and day out. Secret’s unique clear gel formula goes on clear, dries fast, and provides a burst of freshness that lasts all day long. Secret Fresh Clear Gel with pH Balancing Minerals is nothing but fresh for 48 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The History of a Fearless Brand Since 1956, Secret has been helping women bring out the best in themselves. By providing superior wetness and odor protection, Secret has given women the confidence they need to take on any challenge. Fearless Now and Beyond We share the same spirit of individuality, femininity and strength that these fearless women possess, and use it to continue innovating as a brand. Our goals will always be to provide excellent odor and wetness protection, be the best deodorant for sweating, and help women take on each day as fearlessly as they can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I enjoy these deodorants!!
reviews.reviewText: At first I was skeptical because of the reviews I saw on it, but as I tried it on not going to lie it was cold! But felt good especially on a hot summer day. It’s long lasting, it smells good. I feel fresh when I go out. I’ve never tried gel before but I can honestly say I love the gel. at first it felt weird but after a few more times I’ve gotten used to it. I recommend the deodorant definitely would buy again! Thank you Amazon and the seller!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have tried solid deodorant and no matter the brand i still smell a odor later in the day. Also horrible discoloration on my shirts.Someone told me to try gel. Its clear. And im so glad i did! It absolutely works. No more stains or odor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as ordered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I smell so good
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant smells so good. I have been complimented on my smell since I started using it. It keeps me fresh all day long which is really important as I work in a shipping company. It also doesn't leave streaks on my clothes. Good value for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy I found this product! I am someone who sweats a lot and usually my armpit odor is really bad. Even after I wash my armpits they may still smell bad. Tried many other deodorants that wouldn’t cover the smell enough or just weren’t great quality and didn’t last more than a few hours but this one does the trick. It goes on smoothly and I can go 2 days without even needing to reapply! That’s huge for me. I’m not a huge fan of the scent because it is a bit chemically to me but I am very sensitive to scents. It’s not so much that it’s overwhelming and the smell isn’t too strong once you put it on and it dries. Definitely going to be repurchasing this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice smell.
reviews.reviewText: I like the smell A LOT. It also stays for a long time until I shower again.I also love the clear material and not the white powdery material that gets everywhere. If you happen to spill it, it’s clear so you can’t see it.Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to daily deodorant
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite deodorant and when I’m in Texas this is the only do it on I wear because it works so well. I love the suns it’s a good value for the money and is my go to daily deodorant.
Huele muy rico, y venia en excelentes condiciones

I've discovered my new favorite antiperspirant. It offers hassle-free application, exceptional 24-hour sweat protection, a subtle and refreshing scent, and it's gentle on sensitive skin. The packaging is practical and spill-proof, and it's cost-effective in the long run.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Very nice fragrance, came really quickly, are quite expensive so the free delivery was very welcome

Excelente producto. Lo probamos en Miami y por fin lo tenemos disponible gracias a Amazon.Definitivamente es un desodorante que está muy por encima a cualquier desodorante de gama medio alta o alta española.Por supuesto, es una compra recursiva, aunque no se disponga de la opción.
